CHAT.comment: Playing in front of the camera , books and card game.
This file is the first of a series of six (19a to 19f) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: the first 25 seconds come from the audio file . Video starts with transcript line 85 .
Matteo is busy with a book .
turning the control screen of the camera towards the children so that they can see themselves .
Massimo can see himself in the control screen .
Massimo can see himself in the control screen .
Massimo has come close to the camera to wave .
Lou leans over so that her face appears on the screen .
Lou goes back to her chair .
banging on the table with a plastic hammer .
Victor has taken his seat so Matteo grabs the book in front of Victor .
Matteo has the book with trains .
banging on his book with a plastic toy .
showing to Massimo how to use the book .
banging Matteo's arm with his toy .
closing his book and standing up .
Matteo wants to see himself in the control screen of the camera .
handing a card he had picked up from the floor .
Matteo hasn't left yet and is behind the camera .
talking to a child next door .
